subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Dodgers pitcher Matt White’s claim to fame is a 50-acre parcel of land in western Massachusetts that is rich in mica schis, worth an estimated $1.2 billion to $2.4 billion.
snippet: Dodgers pitcher Matt White’s claim to fame is a 50-acre parcel of land in western Massachusetts that is rich in mica schis, worth an estimated $1.2 billion to $2.4 billion.
